ServicesCalculator.Estimate your photography and video pack: Estimate your photography and video package costs

CustomPhotographyVideoPackageCalculatorF.heading: Create Your Custom Photo & Video Package
CustomPhotographyVideoPackageCalculatorF.description: Select the coverage hours and the add-ons that best fit your celebration. We will review your selections and follow up with a personalized quote.
CustomPhotographyVideoPackageCalculatorF.hoursHelper: Adjust the number of hours you would like to book.
CustomPhotographyVideoPackageCalculatorF.hourlyServicesInfo: Hourly services calculate the cost by multiplying your selected coverage hours.
CustomPhotographyVideoPackageCalculatorF.additionsHelper: Choose any add-ons you would like to include. Hourly services can be tailored with their own coverage hours.
CustomPhotographyVideoPackageCalculatorF.noAdditionsMessage: We will share additional services very soon.
CustomPhotographyVideoPackageCalculatorF.summaryDescription: A quick snapshot of everything in your custom package.
CustomPhotographyVideoPackageCalculatorF.summaryDisclaimer: Totals are an estimate and will be confirmed based on availability, logistics, and venue details.
CustomPhotographyVideoPackageCalculatorF.formSubtitle: Share your contact details and we will reach out with availability and next steps.
CustomPhotographyVideoPackageCalculatorF.name: Name
CustomPhotographyVideoPackageCalculatorF.messagePlaceholder: Share venue, timeline, preferred services, or any special requests.
CustomPhotographyVideoPackageCalculatorF.successMessage: Thank you! We will be in touch very soon.
CustomPhotographyVideoPackageCalculatorF.successDetails: We’ve received your details and will respond within the next 24 hours.
CustomPhotographyVideoPackageCalculatorF.errorMessage: Something went wrong while sending your request. Please try again or contact us directly.
CustomPhotographyVideoPackageCalculatorF.invalidEmail: Please enter a valid email address.
CustomPhotographyVideoPackageCalculatorF.honeypotLabel: Don't fill this out if you're human:
